sentences.sContent: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.sCn: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.sContent: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.sCn: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + co(=com共同) + gn(知道) + ize → 再次让大家都知道 → 认出； 认可

words.tran: 可辨认的；可认识的；可承认的
识别；承认，认出；重视；赞誉；公认
认识；意识到（recogniz的过去分词）
承认；认出；辨别（recognise的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past
